FuncDef: This command displays ARP host related information.
CLIs: arp-host [ wholesaler <service-id> ] [ sap <sap-id> | interface <interface-name> | ip-address <ip-address> [ </mask> ] | mac <ieee-address> | { [ port <port-id> ] [ no-inter-dest-id | <inter-dest-id> <inter-dest-id> ] } ] [ detail ]
